property.value: SELECT * FROM (select m.*,CASE task_routing_type WHEN '1' THEN Product_ID ELSE ''END AS product_code, CASE task_routing_type WHEN '2' THEN task_routing_code ELSE ''END AS task_routing_code_display from mrp_task_routing AS m WHERE m.task_routing_type <> '3') AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT up_task_routing_code AS up_task_code , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '001' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS waixie , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '002' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS beiliao , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '003' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS jiguang , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '004' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS shuchong, max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '005' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS zhewan , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '006' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS yamao , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '007' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS yahan , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '008' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS qiege , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '009' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS dakong , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '010' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS gongsi , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '011' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS hanjie , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '012' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS damo , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '013' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS lasi , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '014' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS siyin , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '015' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS peitu , max(CASE task_routing_code WHEN '016' THEN task_routing_standard_hour ELSE '' END) AS zuzhuang FROM mrp_task_routing GROUP BY up_task_routing_code) AS B ON A.task_routing_code =B.up_task_code
